name: Panda BBQ
description:
★★★Top 10 Paid Puzzle Games in Taiwan★★★
★★★Top 100 Paid Games in Over 5 Countries★★★

This Panda may not know Kung-Fu, but he sure knows how to grill! From the maker of popular games “Great Solitaire!” & “Great Solitaire HD” comes a new Puzzle game that will arouse your craving for some heavy Barbecue Action! The new Multiplayer Mode lets you battle with other players around the world!

★DESCRIPTION★
Panda BBQ has a unique game play different from other Match-3 puzzle games, as your objective is to form and clear sets of 3 or more identical ingredients on your Kabob Stick. With some planning and strategy, you can create combos that will boost your scores; you can also utilize various special ingredients with unique powers to your advantage. But be careful not to fill your Kabob Stick with non-matching ingredients!

★HOW TO PLAY★
-Either tap the bottom part of the screen to stick through matching ingredients in a column
-Or tap individual ingredients to stick through all ingredients up to (and including) the tapped one
- Matches of 3 or more of the same ingredient will clear

★4 PLAY MODES★
- *NEW* Multiplayer Mode: Get the most combos and scores in the time limit to defeat your Rival!
- Endless Mode: Unlimited Barbeque action, reach for the highest scores!
- Timed Mode: Create the most combos in the time limit
- Stage Mode: Solve challenging food puzzles. Now arranged by Themes!

*88 levels in the Onion Stage, 88 levels in the Corn Stage; more will be added in future updates

★FEATURES★
- 4 Game Modes for everyone
- Unique, new game play
- Fun and cute layouts in Stage Mode
- Battle with real players around the world
- Fully animated Panda & ingredients; cute and adorable designs
- Special moves and ingredients to get you out of tight situations
- Achievements page with Collectables
- Fully support Game Center, OpenFeint

We’re developing the new version of Panda BBQ & Panda BBQ HD, and we appreciate all your support and valuable comments! Please share your thoughts with us and join our Fans Groups
